BlackStorm::

BlackStorm  prettended to work in the weapon and said "What was my 
past??? Why am I here??? I guess that werent just a maximal, 'cause 
if I were, others preds don't care and would let me do several things 
that I can't "

She spoke soflty as if anyone else heard it


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Hevn::
>        He stops for a moment in the lab to think about what weapon 
could use 
> upgrading.  His melee weapons are well suited to his tastes and 
were already 
> quite flexible in their use.  His ranged weapons however could 
probably use a 
> power boost.  He places his arms on the table and makes his 
blasters pop out of 
> their backs.  "So what did you want to ask me?"
